sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card flat>
        <v-data-table :items="data" :headers="headers">


            <template :data.Poster="{ data }">
                <v-card class="my-2" elevation="2" rounded>
                    <v-img :src="data[0].Poster" height="64"
                        cover></v-img>
                </v-card>
            </template>


            <template v-slot:[`data.Title`]="{ data }">
                <v-rating :model-value="data.Title" color="orange-darken-2" density="compact" size="small"
                    readonly></v-rating>
            </template>

        </v-data-table>
    </v-card>


</template>
<script>
import DataService from '@/DataService';
import axios from 'axios';
export default {
    name: "FavoriteMovies",

    data() {
        return {
            data: [],
            MovieList: [],
            isLoading: false,
            err: "",
            headers: [

                { title: 'Titel', value: 'Title' },
                { title: 'Jahr', value: 'Year' },
                { title: 'Laufzeit', value: 'Runtime' },
                { title: 'Poster', value: 'Director' },
                { title: 'Poster', value: 'Writer' },
                { title: 'Poster', value: 'Actors' },
                { title: 'Poster', value: 'Poster' },

            ]

        };
    },

    methods: {
        getFavordataovies() {
            DataService.getAll()
                .then(response => {
                    this.MovieList = response.data
                    console.log(this.MovieList)
                    this.MovieList = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(this.MovieList))
                    console.log(this.MovieList)
                    this.fetchData()


                })
                .catch(e => {
                    console.log(e);
                });


        },
        fetchData() {
            const url = "https://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=385748cd&i=tt1119646";
            console.log("fetchData-init")

            for (let i = 0; i < this.MovieList.length; i++) {
                console.log("fetchData-loop")



                axios.get(url).then(
                    response => {
                        this.data.push(response.data)
                    }
                )


            }
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        console.log("halo")
        this.getFavordataovies();
    }


}

</script>
<style scoped></style>
